Name: Naranja
Ingredients: 60 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Rum based twist on the classic Old-Fashioned.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2008 by Chris Edwardes at the Hanbury Club in Brighton, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Naranja contains 169 calories
